name: Buncho - The Lost Bird
description:
Made for 2019 Global Game Jam held at Maryland Institute College of Art.

Buncho is a game about a baby bird that has been separated from its mother. It has to build temporary nests and avoid hungry predators on its journey to find her and its siblings again.

Controls mapped for Xbox controllers

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • E to Grab/Drop/Sleep (saves checkpoint)
  • Q to Sing (distracts fox)

Made with Unity by

Amanda Yeh - UI/UX

Samuel Kang - UI/UX and Textures

Christian Herman - 3D Modeling, Audio

Jamie Park -  Lead Programming, Lighting

Stephen Glatfelter - Programming, Level Design

Stefan Vo - 3D Animation, 3D Modeling
